facts.title: Ethereum's Proof of Stake reduces energy consumption by 99.95%
facts.summary: The Ethereum merge to Proof of Stake dramatically reduced the network's energy consumption compared to Proof of Work mining.
facts.author: crypto-researcher

facts.title: World Chain processes over 1M transactions daily
facts.summary: World Chain, the Layer 2 solution by Worldcoin, has reached significant adoption with over 1 million daily transactions.
facts.author: blockchain-analyst

facts.title: Walrus storage network achieves 99.9% availability
facts.summary: The decentralized Walrus storage network demonstrates high reliability with 99.9% uptime across distributed nodes.
facts.author: storage-expert
